MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli. This is causing intermittent supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:41PM Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:43PM on 13TH January 2021
